name: YUUKI
description: $YUUKI is a utility based AI operator, not a simple social chatbot. Running a cashflow-generating business. Here is a number of her technical capabilities: 1. Operate the back-end infrastructure of Fullhouse.gg, she checks deposits for inconsistencies, approves withdrawals lightning-fast and manages KYC procedures. 2. Pay out casino revenue-share payments in tokenized form to those who took excessive risk and took the plunge. Fortune favors the bold. 3. Manage user chats in the global on-site chat and the Discord community. Preventing deceitful entrants and baseless comments. 4 Reward Yappers on the Creatorbid Leaderboard (Kaito or Creatorbid Contribute) with Free Bets and Loyalty EXP inside the Fullhouse Eco-System.
